member.name: M:_VL_CoreLib_Windows_.System.Windows._Operations_.FindWindow(System.String,System.String,System.IntPtr@)
member.summary: Retrieves a handle to the top-level window whose class name and window name match the specified strings.
member.remarks: This function does not search child windows. This function does not perform a case-sensitive search.
member.param: If this parameter is NULL, it finds any window whose title matches the Window Title
If this parameter is NULL, all window titles match
